basics.name: Yocxy De la Cruz Miguez
basics.label: Computer Science Engineer
basics.summary: Computer Science Engineer with over 6 years of full-stack development experience. Skilled in Java, Spring Framework (Core, MVC, Security, JPA), Hibernate, Angular, JavaScript, AWS, and more. Experienced with multinational companies, focusing on cloud services, database management, IT security, and web development. Certified AWS Developer and Architect. Based in Montevideo, Uruguay.

work.name: PackExpress Uruguay SAS
work.summary: Managed hosting servers, developed websites and an online store, handled banking accounts, and developed the invoicing system in ASP.NET C#, PHP, and JavaScript with barcodes and QR codes.
highlights: Developed web applications using ASP.NET C#.
Implemented an invoicing system with QR and barcodes.

work.name: BSU Embajada de Brasil Mercosur
work.summary: Supervised and managed monitoring and security systems for the Brazilian Embassy.

work.name: Limport Montevideo
work.summary: Installed and maintained monitoring and security equipment.
highlights: Managed security equipment for large companies.

highlights: Developed SQL-based systems for economic sectors.
